gameDetails.description: Formerly the X-Men’s greatest foe, Erik Lehnsherr—better known as Magneto—renounced his villainous ways and took up his friend Xavier’s dream of peaceful coexistence between mutants and humans. Now, he fights alongside the X-Men as a hero in his own right, and he’s commanding his way into your games of Marvel Champions: The Card Game! With his iconic power over magnetism allowing him to pull his signature cards from his deck every turn, Magneto is a versatile and powerful hero that can sway the battle in your favor. Within this Hero Pack, you will find Magneto, his fifteen signature cards, and a full assortment of Leadership cards inviting you to command your allies in battle. This pack also includes a bonus modular encounter set featuring the notorious Hellfire Club!
